title: Let's play a game
body:
You walk into a bar, and the most attractive (man/woman/whatever) in the place walks up to you and says... "Hey... what do you say I take you home and [**INSERT CHAMPION ABILITY HERE**] you -wink-"

What League of Legends reference did they try and seduce you with, and what is your reaction?

replies.body:
Well if i was the person doing the asking id be like


Hey baby what do you say i take you home and Xpeke you -wink-

Hot girl: "Hey sexy, how 'bout we get out of here and I ***body slam*** you?"

Me: -gulp- "Er... um.." -***feint***-



((gragas and shen btw))
